Title: Relates to the separate assessment of manufactured homes; repealer
Summary: Relates to the separate assessment of manufactured homes; includes manufactured homes for purposes of the school tax relief (STAR) exemption; relates to the issuance of tax compliance certificates to the owner of a manufactured home.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, the executive law, the real property law and the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to the separate assessment of manufactured homes; and repealing certain provisions of the real property tax law and the real property law relating thereto
